name: Community Programs
description: The Center’s Community Programs department provides San Francisco’s LGBTQ population with events, resources, and collaborations meant to strengthen our diverse cultural landscape. The Center offers services for the LGBTQ community including: -job search and networking resources and events -resources and events for money management mainintaining stable housing -one-on-one counseling and workshops for small business owners -a safe, fun and confidential space for LGBTQ youth (ages 16-24) -a Transge
